snippet: A Ukrainian military spokesman said a Russian convoy had crossed into the Luhansk region to bolster separatists, but offered no clear evidence to support the claim.
abstract: Ukraine accuses Russia of dispatching tanks, troops and other weaponry across the border to bolster separatists who control a small eastern portion of Ukraine.

byline.contributor: James Kanter contributed reporting from Brussels.

lead_paragraph: A Ukrainian military spokesman said a Russian convoy had crossed into the Luhansk region to bolster separatists, but offered no clear evidence to support the claim.

headline.main: Ukraine Accuses Russia of Sending Tanks Across Border
headline.print_headline: Ukraine Accuses Russia of Sending Tanks Across Border

keywords.value: Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe
keywords.name: organizations
